list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: of an extent, amount, or intensity considerably above the normal or average.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the article was of great interest

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: of ability, quality, or eminence considerably above the normal or average.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhạc trưởng tuyệt vời của Ý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to indicate that someone or something particularly deserves a specified description.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was a great fan of Hank's
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi là một fan hâm mộ tuyệt vời của Hank

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in names of family relationships) denoting one degree further removed upward or downward.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Beatles, Bob Dylan, all the greats
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: The Beatles, Bob Dylan, tất cả những người vĩ đại

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we played awful, they played great
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã chơi khủng khiếp, họ chơi tuyệt vời
